movie.title: Project A
movie.description_intro: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. Reluctantly, the Coast Guard is given money to fight these pirates, but the pirates themselves have many contacts (that is, bribed officials) in the government, and seek to thwart the Coast Guard's efforts to eliminate them. One Coast Guard officer is Dragon Ma, who is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made fools of.
movie.description_full: In late 19th Century Hong Kong the British may rule the land, but the pirates rule the waters. Reluctantly, the Coast Guard is given money to fight these pirates, but the pirates themselves have many contacts (that is, bribed officials) in the government, and seek to thwart the Coast Guard's efforts to eliminate them. One Coast Guard officer is Dragon Ma, who is determined that his beloved Coast Guard will not be made fools of.

movies.title: It's Not the Size That Counts
movies.title_english: It's Not the Size That Counts
movies.title_long: It's Not the Size That Counts (1974)
movies.summary: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.
movies.description_full: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.
movies.synopsis: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.

movies.title: The Row
movies.summary: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.
movies.description_full: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.
movies.synopsis: A college freshman discovers a dark secret about the sorority house she's pledging for after a series of murders terrorize the campus.

movies.title: The Philly Kid
movies.summary: An attempt to purchase beer becomes a nightmare for underage friends Chase, Jake and Dillon when Chase ends up dead, Jake gets shot in the back, and Dillon - a championship wrestler - goes to prison for manslaughter. Released after ten years, Dillon's greeted by Jake, who lines him up with a job and introduces him to the world of minor league MMA fighting. Due to Jake's outstanding gambling debt, Dillon agrees to three fights to cover it and literally save Jake's life but finds himself caught between gangsters, dirty cops, a shady promoter, a snide parole officer and Jake's disapproving sister.

movies.title: 7 Seconds
movies.summary: When an experienced thief accidentally makes off with a Van Gogh, his partner is kidnapped by gangsters in pursuit of the painting, forcing the criminal to hatch a rescue plan.
movies.description_full: When an experienced thief accidentally makes off with a Van Gogh, his partner is kidnapped by gangsters in pursuit of the painting, forcing the criminal to hatch a rescue plan.
